Metadata.title: IÖCS Instructor Training 2025 | Join the Experience
Metadata.description: Join the 2025 IÖCS Instructor Training! Be part of an unforgettable experience and make lifelong connections.
Metadata.keywords: IÖCS, Instructor, Training, 2025, Community, Application, Semmelweis, University

HeroSection.heading:
Welcome to the
Instructor Training!
HeroSection.subheading: Be part of an unforgettable experience and make lifelong connections.

ApplicationSection.heading: We’re Excited to Welcome You to the Instructor Training!
ApplicationSection.subheading: Join the IÖCS community and be part of an unforgettable experience!

IntroductionSection.heading: The training groups are just waiting for you!

questions.question2: How can I join the IÖCS?
questions.question3: What are the benefits of being a member?
questions.question4: How can I apply for the training?
questions.question5: What is the duration of the training?
questions.question6: How many people can participate in the training?
questions.question7: What is the age limit for the training?
questions.question8: What is the deadline for applying?
questions.question9: What is the IÖCS community like?
questions.question10: What are the goals of the IÖCS?

answers.answer1: The IÖCS is a student cooperative that aims to support students during their studies and provide them with opportunities to become part of a supportive community.
answers.answer2: You can join the IÖCS by registering on the cooperative's website and applying for the various programmes.
answers.answer3: The benefits of being a member include gaining experience, contributing to different projects, and being part of a super community.
answers.answer4: You can apply for the training by filling out the online application form on the cooperative's website.
answers.answer5: The training will take place from January 20th to February 12th, 2025.
answers.answer6: The training has a capacity of around 300 people.
answers.answer7: The age limit for the training is 16 years old.
answers.answer8: The deadline for applying is January 10th, 2025.
answers.answer9: The IÖCS community is supportive, inclusive, and diverse, with members from different backgrounds and experiences.
answers.answer10: The goals of the IÖCS are to support students during their studies, provide opportunities for personal and professional development, and create a sense of community among members.

descriptions.languages: Enter the languages, separated by spaces.
descriptions.availability: Please let us know on which weekends you are available.
descriptions.international: In the training one group will be conducted in English.
descriptions.acceptRules: I declare that I have read and accepted the 2025 Instructor Training <link>Rules</link> and consider them binding upon myself.
descriptions.acceptPrivacyPolicy: By submitting my application, I confirm that I have read and accepted the <link>Data Protection Notice</link> for the 2025 Instructor Training, the Instructor Volunteer Group, and the IÖCS Association.

placeholders.motivation: Why do you want to participate in english?
